title: Medium term forecast for global fertilizer demand by nutrient to 2023
summary: This statistic shows the Medium of term forecast for global in the fertilizer from 2023 to , by nutrient 2023 .
In 2023 , there were 184 Urea forecast in the fertilizer .
gold: This statistic displays the medium-term forecast of the global demand for fertilizer by nutrient to the period of 2023.
It is forecasted that the demand for urea fertilizers will reach some 184 megatons by 2023.
Increasing crop prices lead to increased fertilizer demands and has been especially noted in recent years in South Asia .
